website_summaries.verdict: This futon model is on the expensive side but packs the same comfort level as many full-size sofa sleepers. We recommend it for guest rooms as spare bedding.
pros: Mid-century modern design, matches existing furniture well
Seat cushions contain individual coil springs for comfort
Includes center leg for additional stability
Easy to assemble, multiple positions available
cons: Actual color of upholstery may not match promoted shade

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: For less than $300, you can't can't any better than this. My friends all couldn't believe that I paid less than $300 for this, and that it was an attractive futon as well! Sure it's not as soft as cushy as a couch, but I wasn't expecting it to be. I'm very happy with this purchase and would buy it again! Tip - when unboxing it, the arm rests are zipped under the seats!! Read the directions!!
customer_reviews.author: Bing Bang

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece of furniture...
customer_reviews.text: Box was large of course, but not long and awkward like others I've seen. It's more of a square box because the futon folds in half. It was very well packaged. In fact I was quite impressed by the way they figured out how to package it all together. Assembly instructions were easy to follow and I had no problem putting it together by myself. Assembled and in place.....I'm very happy with it. I don't have anything negative to say about it. It's a quality piece of furniture for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase of DHP futon. Well built, firm cushioning, great looking!! Super easy to assemble with the help of another person. I like the functionality of going from sitting couch to a bed in just a few clicks. I love it, just what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Affordable Couch
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for the price, especially for our small apartment. It is comfortable for everyday use. After the first week it started to soften up and was a lot more comfortable to relax into. It’s nice because it’s not too soft and still has some structure, but isn’t so stiff you feel like you have to sit upright constantly. The sleeper is a nice feature, but the bar going underneath definitely makes it something you wouldn’t want to sleep on too frequently. The ONLY thing I don’t like, is if someone doesn’t sit back far enough on the couch, the whole couch tips forward. It’s a light design, so pros and cons. Overall would purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Gibler
